duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop power electronics product including power and analog circuitry, magnetics, and firmware from concept through to manufacture, meeting safety and reliability, cost, manufacturing, and performance requirements.
Participation in development, testing and approval of complex power electronic based systems.
Plan and execute verification and validation activities.
To develop new product using modular approach maximizing reusability and efficiency.
Preparation of technical and regulatory documentation, including production documentation, BOM, manuals, test instructions etc.
Use computer-assisted engineering and design software and tools to perform engineering tasks.
Participate in design reviews, project meetings and time/cost budgeting.

Communicate with different parties 
- customer, vendor, internal engineering, and manufacturing; to ensure product meets customer specifications, and quality standards.
Meeting project schedules, deadlines, and budgets.
Order components, tools, and services as required for product and prototype development.
Perform other duties assigned by the Management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Electronics Engineering, Master’s degree a plus
